It includes an aggregator of news and articles, a crypto market monitoring feature, and a portfolio manager. Users also have the opportunity to choose the main screen of the application: News or CoinMarketCap.\r\n\r\nThe application is well optimized: it takes not much space on the disk and CPU, and it also consumes little battery power.\r\n\r\nNews\r\n\r\nCrypto News collects publications from various news sources such as Cointelegraph, Bitcoin.com, CoinDesk, Forklog, Twitter, etc. There are more than 100 websites in the list of sources and it is constantly updated with new ones.\r\n\r\nInformation is provided in English, Russian, German and Spanish languages. The news is systematized in the “Categories”. Also, “Top news” tab contains the most relevant and popular ones. Users can customize the feed and receive information only from certain sources. Each news has an audience interest index. Users will not miss news and events — the push notifications will remind of the most important ones.\r\n\r\nIf the news seems interesting, but there is no time to read it, you can add bookmark it and return later or find it via the title search function. If you think that the news from a single source is not full enough, the app groups materials on this topic in one list, so you can get the alternative or more detailed version of the story.\r\n\r\nCoinMarketCap: feel the market pulse \r\n\r\nThe CoinMarketCap tab is integrated into the app, so you can be aware of cryptocurrency prices in a real-time mode. There are changes for 1 hour, 24 hours or 7 days; You can choose from a linear or “candle” display of the chart.\r\n\r\nThe application collects the data about more than 1000 cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC), Dash, NEO, IOTA (MIOTA), Monero (XMR), NEM (XEM), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Lisk (LSK), Qtum, EOS, Zcash (ZEC), Cardano (ADA), Tether (USDT), Stellar Lumens (XLM), etc. The search function can always help you in finding the needed coin, by name or by the ticker symbol. It is also possible to pin all the important coins at the top of the list.\r\n\r\nUsers can always check the price of a coin on a particular exchange, including Binance, EXMO, Huobi, Kucoin, OKEx and others. It is also possible to track the volume of cryptocurrency trading on the exchanges you are interested in. Crypto News app can notify you about the changes in the coin price, its capitalization, changes of the BTC market share — all you have to do is set the ranges of changes.\r\n\r\nPortfolio management\r\n\r\nThe main function of this feature is to control and monitor the value of various crypto assets. Users can enter the number of coins and indicate the purchase price — the application will calculate their current value and profitability.\r\n\r\nThe application displays both the total balance and the value of each asset separately. It represents profitability for the selected period in percent and real equivalent. You can choose to display portfolio value from the list of fiat currencies. The service does not require personal data, keys and passwords for performance. You can specify any coin balance — it is not necessary to match your real account.\r\n\r\nPRO version\r\nWhat are the benefits of the paid version of Crypto News?\r\nno advertisements,\r\noffline mode for reading news (if there is no internet connection),\r\nunlimited notifications,\r\nunlimited coins in the portfolio,\r\nentering the portfolio by fingerprint, password or FaceID (for iOs).\r\nYou can try all these options for free during a 7-day trial period.\r\n\r\nManage your portfolio, follow the news of the market and the cryptocurrency industry 24/7 with Crypto News!\r\n\r\nAbout us:\r\nWebsite: https://cryptonews.net\r\nPrivacy Policy: https://cryptonews.net/privacy-policy\r\nTerms of use: https://cryptonews.net/disclaimer","descriptionHTML":"Crypto News is a useful application for crypto enthusiasts. In jurisdictions of Canada other than Québec, WDA is registered as a restricted dealer. In Québec, WDA is registered as a derivatives dealer. Crypto-assets purchased and held in an account with Wealthsimple Crypto are not protected by the Canadian Investor Protection Fund, the Canadian Deposit Insurance Corporation or any other investor protection insurance scheme. It works with both binance.us and binance.com. You don’t have to constantly look at TradingView, follow chats with crypto signals, or check the Bitcoin price on Coinmarketcap. Just connect the trading bot and let it earn crypto for you!\r\n\r\nHave you missed the Bitcoin bull run? Trade cryptocurrency all by yourself? Unlike with some random crypto signals — everything is done for you. And it’s better than just holding Bitcoin or trying to predict the next cryptocurrency moonshot. Just put some Tether into your Binance account and the portfolio manager will automatically pick the best blockchain portfolio.\r\n\r\nOf course, you can also use Crypto Stoic as a portfolio tracker is doing, just like you do with Blockfolio or any other crypto tracker.\r\n\r\nIn general, robo investing is a great way to earn crypto. Its crypto signals are created by Cindicator’s 163,000+ crypto analysts and AI.\r\n\r\nCrypto Stoic is not a traditional investing app. It was built from scratch just for blockchain. Holding the millionth of supply guarantees you never over-invest or under-invest in any particular cryptocurrency while assuring a sizable stake on the winning coins of the future. \r\n\r\nUnlike the always inflating and depreciating fiat currencies like the Dollar or the Chinese Yuan, most cryptocurrencies are issued with a fixed limited supply and are deflationary by design. \r\n\r\nThis is great news for investors because it means that once they hold the millionth of supply of a top coin they are guaranteed that, should that coin succeed in the future, they will be part of the monetary elite and extremely wealthy. The millionth of supply is also a great yardstick by which to measure whether you are over investing or under investing in a particular coin when building a balanced crypto portfolio. \r\n\r\n✓ This app will help you create a balanced crypto portfolio tracking the millionth of supply of the top crypto currencies by market cap including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Cardano, Litecoin, NEM, Stellar, IOTA, Dash, NEO, TRON, EOS, Monero, ICON, Bitcoin Gold, Qtum, RaiBlocks, Ethereum Classic, Lisk, Binance Coin, OmiseGO, Verge, Zcash, Siacoin and more! HODL wise!\r\n\r\nThe strategy is based on a combination of passive indexing (recommended and followed by investing legends Warren Buffet and Benjamin Graham) and the new “Millionth of Supply” investing strategy targeted to crypto currencies (popularized by Adam Meister of the Bitcoin Meister Youtube channel at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsqKbe0_9D9gO48DeuDjbCg). \r\n\r\nThe goal of this strategy is to own a millionth of the supply of each of the top coins by market cap. This way you guarantee that if any of them succeeds in the future you will be part of the elite, the top 0.1 percenters and millionaires of the future. If any of the top coins (or some of them) succeed(s) and become(s) a widely used reserve currency you will be guaranteed to own a millionth of its supply.  \r\n\r\nYou can start investing with very little money every month, or buy the top coin’s millionth of supply right away. Either way you’ll be satisfied you did as good as possible without the stress of active investing, the Fear, Uncertainty and Doubt (FUD) and Fear of Missing Out (FOMO) so typical in the crypto investing field. \r\n\r\nUnless all coins fail, which is highly unlikely, you will very likely become a crypto millionaire by following this investing strategy while spending only disposable income. \r\n\r\nIn app French translations by Alexandre Ruiz. Thanks Alex!\r\n\r\nNotes: \r\n\r\n* This app is a simple portfolio manager that helps you keep track of crypto holdings you hold somewhere else or plan to hold. \r\n\r\n* This app DOES NOT collect or transmit to the internet any portfolio information. All portfolio data entered in the app can be entirely made up for education and planning purposes and can be changed at will, by the user, at any time.\r\n \r\n*This app DOES NOT keep any private keys or any actual crypto currencies.\r\n\r\n*This app is NOT an exchange where you can buy, sell or trade crypto currencies. \r\n\r\n*This app DOES NOT deal with ICOs or airdrops.\r\n\r\n* This is not professional investment advice. I'm not your financial advisor. All investments carry a degree of risk. Only invest money you can afford to lose! Do NOT go into debt to invest.","descriptionHTML":"This app helps you create a balanced portfolio that holds the millionth of supply of the top crypto currencies by market cap. Holding the millionth of supply guarantees you never over-invest or under-invest in any particular cryptocurrency while assuring a sizable stake on the winning coins of the future. <br><br>Unlike the always inflating and depreciating fiat currencies like the Dollar or the Chinese Yuan, most cryptocurrencies are issued with a fixed limited supply and are deflationary by design. <br><br>This is great news for investors because it means that once they hold the millionth of supply of a top coin they are guaranteed that, should that coin succeed in the future, they will be part of the monetary elite and extremely wealthy. HODL wise!<br><br>The strategy is based on a combination of passive indexing (recommended and followed by investing legends Warren Buffet and Benjamin Graham) and the new “Millionth of Supply” investing strategy targeted to crypto currencies (popularized by Adam Meister of the Bitcoin Meister Youtube channel at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsqKbe0_9D9gO48DeuDjbCg). <br><br>The goal of this strategy is to own a millionth of the supply of each of the top coins by market cap. This way you guarantee that if any of them succeeds in the future you will be part of the elite, the top 0.1 percenters and millionaires of the future. If any of the top coins (or some of them) succeed(s) and become(s) a widely used reserve currency you will be guaranteed to own a millionth of its supply.  <br><br>You can start investing with very little money every month, or buy the top coin’s millionth of supply right away. By using these third party-services you agree to be bound by their terms and conditions and any applicable laws or regulations.\r\n\r\nBallet Crypto is an app that acts as a companion to your Ballet product, allowing you to manage your cryptocurrencies, check their market value and add additional ones to your wallet.\r\n\r\nFeatures\r\n\r\n*No Account Registration\r\nScan the QR code on your Ballet product to start using the app. There is no need to register an account or go through KYC procedures.\r\n\r\n*Real-Time Market Value\r\nThe app allows Ballet wallet customers to check the market value of their assets in real time.\r\n\r\n*Privacy Guaranteed\r\nThe app does not store your wallet’s private keys. It also does not track, store or transmit your personal or financial data outside the app.\r\n\r\n*Open-Source Industry Standard\r\nBallet wallets and the Ballet Crypto app use the open-source BIP38 protocol.\r\n\r\nFunctions\r\n\r\n*Buy crypto (Beta)\r\nYou can use a credit or debit card to conveniently buy cryptocurrency and automatically deposit it to your Ballet wallet.\r\n\r\n*Deposit and send crypto.\r\nThe Ballet Crypto app allows you to easily deposit, send and manage your cryptocurrency accounts, with safe and efficient processing of transactions. Simply follow the on-screen instructions - no hassle, no confusion.\r\n\r\n*Activate multicurrency.\r\nThe app allows you to activate use of multiple cryptocurrencies on your Ballet product, allowing you to deposit, store, and send more than 50 kinds of cryptocurrencies. Clicking a result box in the Scan Results section will take you directly to the Exchange web page for that particular trade pair so you can submit a buy or sell order. Swipe the scan result away and the scanner will remove past prices data for that trading pair and hence temporarily limit notifications for that pair.\r\n\r\nGreat for quickly detecting those pumps, dumps and panics on the market, or just for assisting with your day-trading and monitoring your favorite coins.\r\n\r\nExtra scanners:\r\nSimple Crypto Scanner now also features two extra on-demand scanners:\r\nUse the volatility scan to find the most volatile trading pair on the exchange in a given time frame.\r\nAnd use the trend scan to list the trading pairs that gained or lost the most.\r\nStart the extra scanners and improve your day-trading decisions.\r\n\r\nLimitations:\r\n- Currently supported exchanges: Binance, Kraken, KuCoin, OKEx\r\n- Price scanners can retrieve prices up to past 2 hours\r\n- Volatility and trend scanner can retrieve prices up to past 5 days\r\n- Scanners are not running in the background\r\nHelps greatly with battery life but may miss price movements when the app is not running or device is locked.\r\n- Can raise many notifications on big price movements\r\nIf you're not interested in a scan result swipe it away under Scan Results section.
